actions.action: Click the "Customers" link in the submenu.
actions.expectedResult: The customer list page is displayed correctly.
A new page for creating a new customer appears.

actions.action: Enter "Jones" in the First Name field
actions.expectedResult: The first name is entered in the field.

actions.action: Enter "Jonathan" in the Last Name field
actions.expectedResult: The last name is entered in the field.

actions.action: Enter the customer's "Email address" as test@test.com.
actions.expectedResult: The email address is entered in the field.

actions.action: Enter the customer's birth year as 2003.
actions.expectedResult: The birth year is entered in the field.

actions.action: Enter the customer's birth month as 1.
actions.expectedResult: The birth month is entered in the field.

actions.action: Enter the customer's birth day as 1.
actions.expectedResult: The birth day is entered in the field.
A "Successful creation" message is displayed at the top of the page.
